Title: You Only Live Twice
Writer: Harold Jack Bloom (additional story material by), Roald Dahl (screenplay by)
Actors: Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Mie Hama, Tetsur√¥ Tanba
Plot: Secret Agent James Bond and the Japanese Secret Service must find and stop the true culprit of a series of space hijackings, before war is provoked between Russia and the United States.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
